   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Advection-Diffusion Module's documentation!
======================================================

**ADVDiff** is a Python module for simulating the tracer transport problem on multiple point sources in parallel. 

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

   :maxdepth: 3
   :caption: Content:
